title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a browser and navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Verify that the page title is 'Swag Labs' and the login form is visible
4. Enter the text 'standard_user' into the username field
6. Enter the text 'secret_sauce' into the password field
7. Locate the Login button and verify it is enabled
9. Wait for the URL to change to https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html
10. Verify that the new page contains the text 'Products' in the header
11. Confirm that the current URL is exactly https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html
